brainly_data.question: What is it when the suns position is directly over earths equator
brainly_data.subject: Geography

all_answers.question: What is it when the suns position is directly over earths equator
all_answers.subject: Geography
all_answers.text: When the sun is directly over the Earth’s equator, it is called an equinox. It happens during the Spring Equinox and Fall Equinox.
